During my recent visit to South Sudan to support Plan International 's relief efforts , I met two young girls aged 9 and 4 in Awerial , in the Lakes state* .
With fear in her eyes , the elder sister recounted her horrifying tale to me - how she and her tiny sister witnessed the execution of their own parents by armed men in their hometown in Jonglei .

The sisters joined the wave of people fleeing the violence , many of them wounded and bleeding from the violence and gun battles that have engulfed the country since a failed attempted coup in December 2013 .
